attributes.action: Don't Scrap The Current Education System for Current Students
attributes.additional_details: Many students in schools today are having to deal with the reality of the education curriculum and system that had been taught from the start of the academic year, being scrapped half way through the year, leaving exams that have been set or planned to have been set this year, scrapped or the results becoming irrelevant. Such as Year 9 GCSE Physics students who have been allowed to take their GCSE's early, have had their planned GCSE exam scrapped, and the current syllabus becoming irrelevant to the new exam to be set for them in 2014.
